title: Very moist chocolate beetroot cake
ingredients: ['225g plain chocolate, chopped', '3 tablespoons espresso coffee', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '220g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '5 eggs, separated', '200g golden caster sugar', '140g self raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 1/2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '250g cooked beetroot, peeled and roughly chopped']
